job.title: Web Developer
job.description: pA new lead front end developer will focus on sophisticated high quality web page developmentnbspThe new developer will support the continued advancement with a range of user centered features for the display and analysis of resultsnbspppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliDesign and develop web applications and services that integrate with the clients productsliliCollaborate with product managers designers and engineers to prototype and implement featuresliliRecommend best approaches for frontend architecture tooling and processesliulpnbspppstrongQualificationsstrongppstrongRequiredstrongpulliBachelors degree in Computer Science Software Engineering or related engineering and technical fieldlili3 years of development experience in front end developmentliliSkilled with HTML CSS JSliliBasic familiarity with objectoriented programming concepts and technologiesliulpbrppstrongPreferredstrongpulliExperience with frontend frameworks such as React and VueliliExperience with Agile developmentliliSome experience with a major cloud provider such as AzureliliSkill in understanding and consuming RESTful APIsliliKnowledge of continuous integration is an advantagenbspliulpp
